Playlist T-Dose 2007
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLBZBIkixHEieGLtIxfaL1y1QPBLTUSegB

T-DOSE 2007, Automated Rapid deployment in modern data centers, By Matt Rechenburg.

How comes that the deployment of a new server takes so much time ?
From the moment the user sends its request for a new server to thesystem-administrator up to the final installed system it often takes some days up to several months.

More at
http://www.t-dose.org/2007/speakers:

Technical Dutch Open Source Event.
October 13, 2007
Fontys Eindhoven.
title: T-DOSE 2007, Automated Rapid deployment in modern data centers, Matt Rechenburg
